name: Elven Tale
description:
Start your 2D adventure as an elf princess in search of new experiences, what will the future hold?

Controls - WASD + Space

Credits - 

Block Model Map Assembled, Conceptual Map Design, Game Designer, Lightning Artist, Script Designer, Sprite Animation - Roberto Cuenda (@RCuenda)

Character Modeling, Concept Art, Sprite Animation - Covadonga Alonso (@SaironThirion)

Scenery Modeling, Texture/Pixel - Ayesha L.M (@NextAeris)
